basics.name: Riley Sodetani
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021.

work.company: School of Ocean and Earth Science and Technology
work.summary: Responsible for the fabrication of cost effective electronic sensor systems that are utilized to study different marine environments with a focus on Ala Wai Canal and coral reefs.
highlights: Ensure the sensors are safe to deploy they are enclosed within pressurized containers rated for depths up to 300 ft
Diagnose, test and repair devices that were damaged during deployment

volunteer.summary: Taught members of Highland Intermediate School's science club a variety of skills ranging from soldering to public speaking
highlights: Mentored a robotics team representing Hawaii at an international tournament

volunteer.summary: Official competetition judge for Robfest for two years

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place at UH Manoa's intraschool Micromouse tournament.  See my projects page for more details.

awards.title: Second place
awards.summary: My team was awarded second place overall in 2017.  See my projects page for more details.
